name: h3
description: Discover the Marucci Kindy12 Green Maple Francisco Lindor Wood Bat, engineered for excellence with a drop 3 length-to-weight ratio, making it perfect for both contact and power hitters. This striking bat features a green barrel and natural handle with silver accents, offering a slightly end-loaded swing feel that leans more towards balance. Handcrafted with precision, it boasts a flared knob, thin handle, and medium barrel for an optimal hitting surface. The Marucci Lindy12 Pro Model is ink dot certified for pro-grade durability and bone rubbed to tighten grains, ensuring a harder hitting surface. Its pro cupped end enhances weight distribution, delivering a superior batting experience.
